title: Privacy Policy
description: saweedessert.com  is committed to protect our customers' privacy and their information in all possible ways. Here in this policy statement we have outlined the methods of data collection, their usage and protection we provide for you information within our website. By using our website, you are aware about our policies and agree to the measures we took under these statements on your privacy.

sections.sectionTitle: What are the Information we Collect
sections.sectionDescription: When using our website we collect the following information.

list.content: Personal information for the identification process of a user in the registration process and the checkout process. These information are crucial for the application processes They are as follows,
Payment and billing information necessary to process your orders, including credit card details, which are securely handled by trusted third-party payment processors.
Browsing information, such as your IP address, browser type, and device information, collected automatically using cookies and similar technologies.

sections.sectionDescription: We uses the collected information on following subjects

list.content: Uniquely identify you and your purchase details for the user account.
To process and fulfill your orders, including shipping and delivery.
Contact you in order to provide you with better service with our customer services and important identification purposes.
To increase your experience with simplifying the purchasing process with reusing the saved data to make it easy to use the application.
To improve the website performance, usability and overall experience for the end user.
Validate the purchasing processes and prevent unauthorized access, frauds and misuse of the application for a consistent reliable service.

sections.sectionDescription: We do respect the privacy of your data that we have collected and confirm that we do not sell, trade or transfer the information to any other third party without your consent except in the following circumstances.

list.content: Trusted service providers: We may share your information with third-party service providers who assist us in operating our website, processing payments, and delivering products. These providers are contractually obligated to handle your data securely and confidentially.
Legal requirements: We may disclose your information if required to do so by law or in response to valid legal requests or orders.

sections.sectionDescription:
We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, please be aware that no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

sections.sectionDescription: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance the overall experience of the web application by analyzing the user engagement, traffic to the web application, user preferences related data gathering within our website.

We reserve the right to update or modify this Privacy Policy at any time. Any changes will be posted on this page with a revised 'last updated' date. We encourage you to review this Privacy Policy periodically to stay informed about how we collect, use, and protect your information.

If you have any inquiries regarding questions, concerns, requests for the way we handle your privacy for the personal information, please contact us using the information provided on our website for the contact.
